name: R-gis-tutorial
tagline: Spatial data in R: using R as a GIS tutorial
body:
### Spatial data in R: using R as a GIS tutorial
This is a tutorial on how to perform basic GIS operations in R, such as importing and exporting data (both vectorial and raster), plotting, analysing and making maps.

```
$ cd Pakillo/R-GIS-tutorial
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Author
Francisco Rodriguez-Sanchez (@Pakillo)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
